mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news( id, userid, companyid, type, title, content ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userid}, #{companyid}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select id,userid,companyid,type,title,content from news where userid=#{userid} and companyid=#{companyid} and type=#{type} and title=#{title} and isdel=0
select id,userid,companyid,type,title,content from news where isdel=0 and type = #{type} order by createtime desc limit #{pageindex},#{endpage}
mapper.update: update news set isdel=1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,userid,companyid,title,content from news where isdel=0 and (title like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%'))
